title: Stage Lv7-P1-S04
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: By the time you graduate, you will have gained valuable experience through internships.
The project will have been completed by next month's board meeting.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 당신이 졸업할 때쯤이면, 인턴십을 통해 귀중한 경험을 쌓았을 것이다.
sentences.en: By the time you graduate, you will have gained valuable experience through internships.

sentences.kr: 다음 달 이사회 회의까지는 프로젝트가 완료되었을 것이다.
sentences.en: The project will have been completed by next month's board meeting.

sentences.kr: 과학자들은 이번 십년이 끝날 때까지 중요한 발견들을 했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Scientists will have made significant discoveries by the end of this decade.

sentences.kr: 2030년까지는 재생 에너지가 전통적인 화석 연료를 대체했을 것이다.
sentences.en: By 2030, renewable energy will have replaced traditional fossil fuels in many sectors.

sentences.kr: 당신이 은퇴할 때쯤이면, 충분한 자금을 저축했을 것이다.
sentences.en: By the time you retire, you will have saved enough money for a comfortable life.

sentences.kr: 내년 이맘때까지는 새로운 시스템이 모든 부서에 구현되지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: By this time next year, the new system will not have been implemented in all departments.

sentences.kr: 그들이 도착할 때까지는 우리가 모든 준비를 마쳤을 것이다.
sentences.en: By the time they arrive, we will have finished all the preparations.

sentences.kr: 회의가 시작되기 전까지는 모든 참석자들이 보고서를 검토했을 것이다.
sentences.en: All participants will have reviewed the report before the meeting begins.
